name: project-ida
description: Project IDA: Multi-tenant SaaS Data Analysis Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w @project-ida/web" "npm run dev -w gateway-service" "npm run dev -w auth-service" "npm run dev -w tenant-service" "npm run dev -w upload-service" "npm run dev -w parser-service" "npm run dev -w eda-service" "npm run dev -w job-orchestrator-service" "npm run dev -w billing-service" "npm run dev -w ai-service" "npm run dev -w @project-ida/admin-service"
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @project-ida/logger && npm run build -w @project-ida/db && npm run build -w @project-ida/auth
